heading: Radisson Blu Udaipur Palace Resort and Spa | Luxury Staycation Deal
inclusions: Entrance fees (Cable and car and Moon Valley)
Box lunch water, banana apple and chocolate

itinerary.day1Heading: Luxury Staycation at Radisson Blu Udaipur Palace Resort and Spa: Day 1
itinerary.day1Overview:
09:00 AM - Check-in at Radisson Blu Udaipur Palace Resort and Spa.
10:00 AM - Enjoy a sumptuous breakfast at the hotel's restaurant.
11:00 AM - Relax by the poolside and soak in the scenic views of Lake Fateh Sagar.
01:00 PM - Indulge in a rejuvenating spa treatment at the resort's spa center.
03:00 PM - Take a guided tour of the resort's expansive grounds and learn about its historical significance.
05:00 PM - Enjoy evening tea or coffee at the lake-facing lounge area.
07:00 PM - Savor a gourmet dinner at the hotel's fine dining restaurant.
09:00 PM - Spend the evening stargazing or enjoying live music at the resort's entertainment venue.

itinerary.day2Heading: Luxury Staycation at Radisson Blu Udaipur Palace Resort and Spa: Day 2
itinerary.day2Overview:
08:00 AM - Wake up to a beautiful sunrise and go for a morning walk around the resort's landscaped gardens.
09:00 AM - Enjoy a lavish breakfast buffet with a wide selection of local and international cuisine.
10:30 AM - Participate in a yoga or meditation session conducted by the resort's wellness experts.
12:00 PM - Explore nearby attractions such as City Palace, Jagdish Temple, and the bustling markets of Udaipur.
02:00 PM - Return to the resort for a relaxing afternoon by the pool or on a private boat ride on Lake Fateh Sagar.
04:00 PM - Take part in a cooking class to learn traditional Rajasthani recipes.
07:00 PM - Attend a cultural performance showcasing local music and dance traditions.
08:30 PM - Enjoy a farewell dinner featuring a special menu prepared by the resort's culinary team.
10:00 PM - Relax and unwind in the comfort of your luxurious room or suite.

overView.heading: Royal Romance: Jaipur Honeymoon Retreat
overView.text: After breakfast take a boat ride at Lake Pichola. Next visit City Palace - It was built by the Maharana Udai Singh as the capital of the Sisodia Rajput clan in 1559. Jagdish Temple- Jagdish Temple is a large Hindu temple in the middle of Udaipur in Rajasthan. A big tourist attraction, the temple was originally called the temple of Jagannath Rai but is now called Jagdish-Ji, Saheliyon ki Bari (Gardens of the maids of Honor) and Museum. Evening transfer to the hotel. Stay overnight at the hotel.  Udaipur the City of Lakes is one among the most romantic and most beautiful city of India. It is a lovely land around the blue water lakes, edge of the lush hills of the Aravalis. A vision in white soaked in romance and beauty, Udaipur city of Rajasthan state is a fascinating blend of sights, sounds and experiences - an inspiration for the imagination of the painters, poets and writers. Udaipur's lakes, gardens, temples and narrow lanes scattered with stalls, carry the flavor of heroic past, epitomizing valor and chivalry.

overView.heading: Palatial Paradise in Jaipur
overView.text: Indulge in the grandeur of Jaipur's palaces and forts. Discover the enchanting Amer Fort, stroll through the City Palace, and marvel at the Hawa Mahal. Let the majestic architecture transport you to a bygone era of royal opulence.

overView.heading: Cultural Delights and Local Markets
overView.text: Explore the vibrant markets of Jaipur, adorned with traditional crafts and local delicacies. Immerse yourself in the cultural tapestry, attend folk performances, and savor the flavors of authentic Rajasthani cuisine.

overView.heading: Romantic Strolls in Palace Gardens
overView.text: Experience moments of tranquility in the lush gardens surrounding Jaipur's palaces. Take romantic strolls in the picturesque landscapes, where history meets nature, creating an idyllic setting for cherished memories.

overView.heading: Artisan Crafts and Heritage Workshops
overView.text: Engage in hands-on experiences with local artisans. Participate in heritage workshops, learn traditional crafts, and witness the intricate artistry that defines Jaipur. Take home souvenirs that encapsulate the city's artistic legacy.

overView.heading: Preserving Rajasthani Heritage
overView.text: Jaipur is dedicated to preserving its rich heritage. From architectural conservation to cultural initiatives, the city strives to protect its historical treasures, ensuring they endure as a testament to Rajasthan's royal legacy.

overView.heading: Plan Your Jaipur Escape
overView.text: Whether seeking palatial romance, cultural immersion, or artisanal experiences, Jaipur promises an enchanting escape. Plan your retreat to the Pink City, where every street echoes with tales of royalty, and every moment is a celebration of Jaipur's allure.
